long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Mentarc Chrome Extension is a helpful tool for cross-border e-commerce. It lets you quickly save product information from Amazon to your Mentarc account, and then easily sync these saved products to your Shopify store with just one click. In the future, we will support more e-commerce platforms. This extension makes managing and listing products faster and simpler, using the power of Mentarcâ€™s AI to support your e-commerce needs.
